titlestmt.titleproper: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, History, RG 12
A Guide to the John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, History, RG 12 FA1806

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-10-01 04:57:20 UTC.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation records, History, RG 12

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: John S. and James L. Knight Foundation

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Record Group 12 contains information related to the Knight Foundation history project. It contains the final version of "The Knight Foundation History" by Virginia Henke. Also included are photographs, clippings, and transcripts of the oral history interviews that were used to write the history.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Material less than 10 years old is restricted.

Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Knight Foundation has title, copyright and literary rights in the collection, in so far as it holds them.

The Rockefeller Archive Center has authority to grant permission to cite and publish material from the collection. Permission to publish extensive excerpts, or material in its entirety, will be referred to the Knight Foundation.

did.unittitle: History
Policies and History

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains a collection of memos, correspondence, and policy statements concerning grants and giving. Includes memos from: John S. Knight appointing a journalism grant review committee, August 5, 1971; Lee Hills re: Future of the Knight Foundation, August 22, 1972; John S. Knight re: payout requirements, January 4, 1977; C.C. Gibson re: the first meeting of the Policy Review Committee, October 18, 1985; and Creed Black re: maintaining distinctions between the Knight Foundation and the Knight-Ridder newspaper chain. Also included is a "confidential statement of information about the Foundation" prepared by C.C. Gibson, February 24, 1978; a grants summary for the years 1982 - 1987; and a letter to the trustees of The Knight Foundation from James L. Knight outlining his vision for the future, April 6, 1990.

did.unittitle: "Knight Foundation History"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Knight Foundation History, written by Virginia Henke. 335 pages, including an appendix of original documents, and chronological lists of officers and trustees (1950-1998) and historical highlights (1950-1998). 1 bound copy, 1 unbound copy.

did.unittitle: Knight Foundation - General History

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Miscellaneous materials, including two documents with information culled from the Board minutes; background information on the Foundation prepared by CC Gibson; an article from the Foundation Giving Watch newsletter; a letter from Creed Black to the Editor of the Akron Beacon Journal correcting its story on the Knight Foundation; a history of Knight Foundation written in 1991; and a list of trustees as of March 1994 and the years they were elected to the Board.

did.unittitle: Miami Herald History and John S. Knight Photos

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: "The Miami Herald: Writing and Making History" and "The Knight Brothers: Building a Legacy" published in Preservation Today by Dade Heritage Trust in 2012. Also includes copies of two White House letters; copies of Miami Herald photos of John S. and James L. Knight and various people including: Frank B. Shutts, George C. Marshall, Dwight Eisenhower, Richard Nixon, Harry Truman, Luis Munoz Marin, Nelson Rockefeller, Adlai Stevenson, Barry Goldwater,Eleanor Roosevelt, the Duke of Windsor, Hubert Humphrey, Ben Schneider, Alvah Chapman, Bernard Ridder, Lee Hills

did.unittitle: Final Edition, Journalism according to Jack and Jim Knight, DVD

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: DVD documentary by Paul Jacoway of Paul R. Jacoway Productions of Akron, OH and Kathleen Endres, professor at University of Akron. Tells the sotry of the Knight family, the Beacon Journal and the rise and fall of Knight-Ridder. Copyright Paul Jacoway.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Digital access copy currently unavailable. Please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

did.unittitle: Oral History Interviews
Agreements for Oral History Interview Transcripts

scopecontent.p: Agreements for the oral history interview transcripts created by Virginia Henke. Includes a blank agreement, and those signed by interviewee and Eugene Struckhoff.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Laurie Peterson's oral history interview with Marc Fest on November 28, 2011 in Miami, FL. Includes transcript, index, a list of questions, and authorization letter. This interview was done shortly before Fest's resignation from KF as Vice President of Communications.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents

did.unittitle: Interview with C.C. Gibson by Virginia Henke

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript and notes from Virginia Henke's oral history interview with C.C. Gibson in Akron, Ohio, 6/18/96 and 6/24/96. A copy of the transcript release form is included, as well as a letter written to Mr. Gibson outlining the issues he would be asked to discuss.

did.unittitle: Interview with Jessica Goldfin, by Laurie Peterson

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Laurie Peterson's oral history interview with Jessica Goldfin on July 13, 2012 in Miami, FL. Includes transcript, index, a list of questions, and authorization letter. This interview was done shortly after Goldfin left KF for a job with MIT Media Lab.

did.unittitle: Interview with Paul Grogan, by Laurie Peterson

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Laurie Peterson's oral history interview with Paul Grogan on February 23, 2012 in Boston, MA. Includes transcript, index, a list of questions, and authorization letter. This interview was done shortly before Grogan's retirement from the KF Board of Trustees.

did.unittitle: Interview with Gordon Heffern, by Virginia Henke

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Virginia Henke's oral history interview with Gordon Heffern on 6/28/96 in Cocoa Beach, FL. Includes transcript, Advance letter, Biographical Information and authorization letter.

did.unittitle: Interview with Larry Jinks, by Virginia Henke

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Virginia Henke's oral history interview with Larry Jinks on 11/22/96, in Miami, FL. Includes transcript, Advance letter with list of attachments, Biographical Information and authorization letter.

did.unittitle: Interview with John S. Knight, by Dan Neuharth

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Dan Neuharth's oral history interview with John S. Knight in Akron, Oh.. Includes an introduction by Dan Neuharth. While the interview focuses on Knight's career and the state of the newspaper business, the Knight Foundation is mentioned on page 7. Also included is an op-ed piece written by Neuharth and posted on USATODAY.com in which he recalls his interview with Knight.

did.unittitle: Interview with Belinda Lawrence, by Laurie Peterson

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Laurie Peterson's oral history interview with Belinda Lawrence on April 12, 2013 in Aventura, FL. Includes transcript, index, a list of questions, and authorization letter.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Virginia Henke's oral history interview with Rick Love on 2/19/97, in Miami, FL. Includes transcript, advance letter, and authorization letter.

did.unittitle: Interview with Penelope McPhee, by Virginia Henke

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Virginia Henke's oral history interview with Penelope McPhee on 3/19/97 and 4/8/97, in Miami, FL. Includes transcript, advance letter with a list of attachments, biographical information, and authorization letter.

did.unittitle: Interview with Penelope McPhee, by Laurie Peterson

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Laurie Peterson's oral history interview with Penelope McPhee on 3/22/04, in Miami, FL. Includes transcript, a list of questions, biographical information, and authorization letter. This interview, done shortly before McPhee left Knight to head the Arthur M. Blank Family Foundation, picks up with McPhee's career in 1997. See Henke's earlier interview with McPhee for pre-1997 information.

did.unittitle: Interview with Larry Meyer, by Laurie Peterson

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Laurie Peterson's oral history interview with Larry Meyer on July 9 & 11, 2008, in Miami, FL. Includes transcript, index, a list of questions, and authorization letter. This interview was done shortly before Meyer's retirement from KF as Vice President of Communications and Secretary.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents

scopecontent.p: Notes and a detailed summary of Virginia Henke's interview with Lyle Nelson, conducted on 12/5/96 in Palo Alto, CA. No transcript of this interview was made, only a summary.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Restricted - Please contact an RAC archivist for further information.

Includes transcript, index, a list of questions, and authorization letter. This interview was done shortly after Ms. Patterson's retirement from KF as Charlotte's Program Director.

did.unittitle: Interview with Linda L. Raybin, by Virginia Henke

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Virginia Henke's oral history interview with Linda Raybin, on 3/5/97 in Miami, FL. Includes transcript, advance letter, biographical information, and authorization letter.

did.unittitle: Interview with Nancy Rabin, by Virginia Henke

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Virginia Henke's oral history interview with Nancy Raybin, strategic planning consultant to the foundation, on 2/10/98, in Washington, DC. Includes transcript with attachments, advance letter, and authorization letter. In this interview, Raybin discusses the culture of Knight Foundation, its program officers, board members, and governance issues. She oversaw the writing of a strategic plan in 1991, and again in 1995.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Laurie Peterson's interview with John W. Rogers, retired trustee. Also includes keyword index and release form.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Transcript from Virginia Henke's oral history interview with Barbara Knight Toomey on 1/16/97 in Sanibel, FL. Includes transcript, advance letter with a list of attachments, biographical information, and authorization letter.

did.unittitle: Index to the Oral History Interview Transcripts

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Index of the Oral History interview transcripts conducted by Timothy Jacobson of the Winthrop Group and Virginia Henke between 1996 and 1998. The index lists keywords, the interviewee, the date of the interview, and the page number. 230 pages. (2 folders)

did.unittitle: Index to the Oral History Interview Transcripts

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Digital access copy currently unavailable. Please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.
